customer_reviews.title: Great hydration but causes brassy tones in blonde highlights

I have tried many different hydrating conditioners containing oils (argan oil, coconut oil, macadamia nut oil,...) because oils are definitely effective hydrating agents. When used at maximum strength (in a mask for example) the results are fabulous, my hair becomes silky and full of body, but the counterpart is that they naturally oxidize hair and therefore create awful brassy tones in blonde highlights.

product_meta.description: Style:Conditioner**Product has been recently updated by the manufacturer. Packaging may vary.** Coconut Conditioner for Hair NourishmentNourishing Coconut Milk Conditioner is vegan friendly conditioner that nourishes and smoothens your hair. It contains a mixture of organ
feature_bullets: COCONUT MILK CONDITIONER: This deliciously creamy & nourishing conditioner hydrates tresses while helping support strength & elasticity. Leaves hair feeling soft & shiny with a hint of tropical fragrance.

NOURISH & PROTECT: This nourishing blend with coconut milk, egg white proteins & coconut oil helps bring out your hair’s natural strength, elasticity, hydration & balance. Hair looks shiny & feels soft.
BEAUTY PURE & SIMPLE: OGX products are inspired by nature. We don’t try to make hair look “perfect” because we’d rather make hair look fuller, smoother, curlier, or bouncier & smell irresistible.
WHAT HAIR WANTS: Whether you need quenching moisture for curly hair, protection for color treated hair, blowout cream or matte pomade, OGX hair care products are designed to bring out your best.
REAL QUALITY, REAL BEAUTY: Unattainable looks don't inspire us but originality does. OGX hair & skin care product collections are here to help you look your best! We’re beauty, pure & simple.
